crop.title: Image Crop
crop.description: Provides an easy to use tool for manually cropping images for all image sizes.

ilab-media-imgix-settings.title: Imgix Settings
ilab-media-imgix-settings.description: Required settings for imgix integration to work.

ilab-media-imgix-domains.title: Imgix Domains
ilab-media-imgix-domains.description: List of your source domains. For more information, please read the imgix documentation

ilab-media-imgix-signing-key.title: Imgix Signing Key
ilab-media-imgix-signing-key.description: Optional signing key to create secure URLs. Recommended. For information on setting it up, refer to the imgix documentation.

ilab-media-imgix-image-settings.title: Imgix Image Settings
ilab-media-imgix-image-settings.description: Put your imgix image settings here

ilab-media-imgix-auto-format.title: Auto Format
ilab-media-imgix-auto-format.description: Allows imgix to choose the most appropriate file format to deliver your image based on the requesting web browser.

s3.title: S3
s3.description: Automatically uploads media to Amazon S3.

ilab-media-s3-aws-settings.title: AWS Settings
ilab-media-s3-aws-settings.description: To get S3 working, you'll have to supply your AWS credentials.  However, the better way of doing it would be to place that information in a .env file, instead of storing it in the database.

ilab-media-s3-access-key.title: AWS Access Key
ilab-media-s3-access-key.description: If you are supplying this value through a .env file, or environment variables, the key is: ILAB_AWS_S3_ACCESS_KEY

ilab-media-s3-secret.title: AWS Secret
ilab-media-s3-secret.description: If you are supplying this value through a .env file, or environment variables, the key is: ILAB_AWS_S3_ACCESS_SECRET

ilab-media-s3-bucket.title: AWS Bucket
ilab-media-s3-bucket.description: If you are supplying this value through a .env file, or environment variables, the key is: ILAB_AWS_S3_BUCKET

ilab-media-s3-region.title: AWS Region
ilab-media-s3-region.description: If you are supplying this value through a .env file, or environment variables, the key is: ILAB_AWS_S3_REGION
